item.title: I want to give Oracle money but I can't
item.description: Yeah, yeah, I know. I shouldn't even be thinking about using Oracle in the first place, but their compute pricing is just too tasty to ignore. You'd think that for a company that's well known for vacuuming as much lifeblood as it can from its customers, it would be relatively easy to give them money, but you'd be wrong.
